name: Forsaken Planet Companion Bundle
desc: Travel PlayStation Home with your favorite companions from Forsaken Planet, a LOOT Entertainment videogame for tablets and smart phones. This bundle comes with all five Forsaken Planet companions Pimento, Camel, Raccoon, Zombie and Cow. When you purchase this Forsaken Planet Companion Bundle, you unlock a character and character hat* for use in the Forsaken Planet game. This character and hat can only be unlocked in PlayStation Home. To retrieve your rewards, create or access your LOOT Entertainment account at the log-in station located at the Forsaken Planet globe logo in the LOOT Space Station Hub. Looking for even sweeter Forsaken Planet deals and in-game rewards? Check out the Forsaken Planet Ultimate Bundle in the LOOT Store. (*Character and character hat unlock specialized gameplay perks within the Forsaken Planet videogame.)
